glob_attribs.title: TROPOMI SIF and Reflectances as Derived from ESA L2B Product
glob_attribs.institution: University of Oklahoma, College of Atmospheric and Geographic Sciences
glob_attribs.author: Russell Doughty, PhD
glob_attribs.source: This gridded data was generated from the ESA TROPOMI L2B SIF product available at https://s5p-troposif.noveltis.fr/data-access/.
glob_attribs.references: Guanter, L., Bacour, C., Schneider, A., Aben, I., van Kempen, T.A., Maignan, F., Retscher, C., KÃ¶hler, P., Frankenberg, C., Joiner, J. and Zhang, Y., 2021. The TROPOSIF global sun-induced fluorescence dataset from the Sentinel-5P TROPOMI mission. Earth System Science Data Discussions, pp.1-27.
glob_attribs.comment: Gridding was done with the oversampling method, originally coded by Dr. Christian Frankenberg (https://github.com/cfranken/gridding). Data was permuted using the NCO package.
glob_attribs.filters: Input soundings were filtered for cloud fracton = 0; SIF_735 < 5.0; SIF_Corr_735 < 3.0; and SIF_ERROR_735 < 0.3.
